passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(8) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2
html > body > div:nth-child(10) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(11) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
